greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows in which row n lists the number of digits of the binary expansion of the divisors of n.
comment: Row n lists the number of digits of the numbers in the n-th row of triangle A182620.
link: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: with(numtheory):for n from 1 to 12 do for d in divisors(n) do printf("%d, ",length(convert(convert(d, binary),string))); od:printf("\n"); od: # _Nathaniel Johnston_, Apr 19 2011
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Nov 23 2010
